title: Happy Family
text:
Happy Family
my cousin's married and lives in this house
the other day I came over and murdered his spous
his daughter was there I started pullin her hair
smacked the slut in the face, and scattered her teeth all over the place, made her dad rape her puppy while I stomped on her mouse, then his wife came on home, so I said now starts the fun
I kicked her in the stomach so she started to run
so I reached in my bag and pulled out a shotgun, and aimed it at her head,
pulled back the trigger and saw the whole room go red, bits and pieces of the bitches brains got in the carpet to leave permanent stains
ohh well at least I got what I wanted, exhale once, twice, now I'm saticfied, my thirst is reseeding, extreem intulactual dreaming, I'm seein stars now, my worlds perfect, I just killed a whole family without no purpose..
